GameData

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameData.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a data structure for the game. it keeps two ArrayLists, one for the fruits and one for the pacmans.
    Author:
    Tal, Oranit, Amitai
